entry.title: Hello World!
entry.content:
Welcome to my blog! This is my very first post. my name is Eldad Rudich and I’m a software developer and security researcher from Israel.
My main interests are low level development and research and this blog will mainly focus on those topics.
please feel free to contact me via email or twitter, you can read more about me in the About section of this site.
entry.summary: Welcome to my blog! This is my very first post. my name is Eldad Rudich and I’m a software developer and security researcher from Israel.
